page.title: 10Howards Garden Centre
page.content:
Mr Howard has been working in Howards in Lower Beeding for 20 years but he has been in Howards garden centre for 28 years. 17 people work for Mr Howard. Mr Howard has a lot of customers, both old and young who visit the garden centre. Mr Howard has a lot of things stolen. Mr Howard sells anything to do with gardening. Mr Howard sells rare flowers but not so rare that there is only one or two left in the world. Mr Howard sells fish but he does not sell any other animals. Most of Mr Howards customers are regular. Mr Howard is very happy at Howards garden centre.
By Rachel Donovan & Wendy swaffer.
